Title: 37338 - # Tasks Your Home Business Should Outsource
Direction: 500 words: Write a list of three to six tasks that home businesses should outsource to professionals. The list should not only tell readers what types of services they can outsource, but what benefits they will get from doing so (e.g., saving time, getting more precise data, improving customer service). You can include the client's keyword and target URL by mentioning one or more aspects of Ruota's execution management. Your target audience is for current or future small business owners

Title: 37340 - # Key Elements of Project Management
Direction:
500 words: List 3-6 key elements of project management in the business world. These elements should be tailored to an executive manager of a business/various projects. What are the key elements of successful project management? Try to avoid basic information and instead give tips and tricks for each element, like info on new products that help readers successfully reach and complete each element of project management.

The Target URL goes to Ruota's Project Management services and technologies that help businesses monitor progress and deliver outcomes, so be sure to include a branded anchor text phrase and explain the services they offer, and how they help with project management, under one of the key elements listed.
